mapper.update: update app_bank_cash_receive set bank_cash_receive_id = #{bankCashReceiveId}, account_no = #{accountNo}, is_post_dated_check = #{isPostDatedCheck}, from = #{from}, date = #{date}, reference_no = #{referenceNo}, amount = #{amount}, memo = #{memo} where bank_cash_receive_id = #{bankCashReceiveId};
